text: Sihamte ka’le, ‘he chu'a'iba! Tomara chalate tomaka e'i nirdesa diye neki ye, amara pitr-purausasakale yisakalara ibadata karaichila ami sihamtaka barjana karaiba lagiba arau ami amara dhana-sampada samparke nija icchamate yi karao seya'o (barjana karaiba lagiba)? Kerala tumihe sahisnu, sadacarai’
